official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim September 8 of each year as, "National Cancer Prevention Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President of the United States to issue a proclamation each year designating September 8 as "National Cancer Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim September 8 of each year as, "National Cancer Prevention Day".
